WeatherCommentary.TodaysReport: Groomer picks of the day are Quit 'N Time  & Prospector at the Mountain Village and Pipe Dream & Mercury at the Canyons Village.
WeatherCommentary.WeatherReport: Mostly sunny, with a high near 33. Wind chill values as low as 7. South southwest wind 7 to 11 mph.
